sentences.en: Another section of the Act delegates broad power to the ALJ to control the proceeding.
sentences.cn: 该法的另一条款授予行政法法官广泛的权力以控制诉讼程序.

sentences.en: I couldn't assent to, much less participate in such proceeding.
sentences.cn: 我对于这种举动并不赞成, 哪里还谈得上参与呢.

sentences.en: I was proceeding along the High Street in a northerly direction.
sentences.cn: 我正在沿着大街向北走去.

sentences.en: I was proceeding through torrents of rain.
In the meantime the protoplanet cores were proceeding to consolidate.
sentences.cn: 在此期间,原行星的核开始凝成.

sentences.en: In this respect, the proceeding was functionally similar to a comparative licensing adjudication.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上, 手续在作用上即类似于比较许可证发放的裁断.

sentences.en: It seemed a sensible and methodical way of proceeding.
sentences.cn: 这似乎是继续下去的一种明智而有序的做法。

sentences.en: John is taking legal proceedings against his ex-partner.
sentences.cn: 约翰在对他的前合伙人提起法律诉讼。

sentences.en: Normally, the next step would be a section 6 proceeding.
sentences.cn: 一般来讲, 下一环节是第6条的程序.

sentences.en: The creditors decided ot initiate a bankruptcy proceeding.
sentences.cn: 债权人决定提起破产之诉.

sentences.en: The DOT is to publish the conference proceedings.
sentences.cn: 运输部将公布会议记录。

sentences.en: The flight is proceeding to Paris.
The proceedings of the inquiry will take place in private.

sentences.cn: 工作很有生气地进展着.

sentences.en: These forms of proceeding are respectively known as'statutory review " and " nonstatutory review. "
sentences.cn: 这些程序的形式分别被称为 " 法定复审 " 和 " 非法定复审 ".

sentences.en: This train is now proceeding from Paris to London.
sentences.cn: 这次列车从巴黎开往伦敦.

sentences.en: Two rags proceeding from the same point form an angle.
sentences.cn: 从同一点出发的两条射线形成一只角.

sentences.en: With respect to factual issues, the standard of review depends on the type of proceeding.
sentences.cn: 至于那些事实性问题, 复审的准则取决于程序的类型.

words.tran_cn: 经过特殊加工（或处理）的
过程，进行；方法，步骤；作用；程序；推移
队伍，行列；一列，一排；列队行进
[计] 处理器；处理程序；加工者
开始；继续进行；发生；行进
开始；继续做；行进（proceed的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 进行，进程，行动，诉讼，会议记录
trans.tran_en: The proceedings are an organized series of events that take place in a particular place

trans.tran_cn: 进行( proceed的现在分词)，前进，（沿特定路线）行进，（尤指打断后）继续说
